metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1324 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - high.
metadata.Description:
Apport before 2.17.2-0ubuntu1.1 as packaged in Ubuntu 15.04, before 2.14.70ubuntu8.5 as packaged in Ubuntu 14.10, before 2.14.1-0ubuntu3.11 as packaged in Ubuntu 14.04 LTS, and before 2.0.1-0ubuntu17.9 as packaged in Ubuntu 12.04 LTS allow local users to write to arbitrary files and gain root privileges by leveraging incorrect handling of permissions when generating core dumps for setuid binaries.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1324` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

apport - 2.17.3-0ubuntu1
apport-gtk - 2.17.3-0ubuntu1
apport-kde - 2.17.3-0ubuntu1
apport-noui - 2.17.3-0ubuntu1
apport-retrace - 2.17.3-0ubuntu1
apport-valgrind - 2.17.3-0ubuntu1
dh-apport - 2.17.3-0ubuntu1
python-apport - 2.17.3-0ubuntu1
python-problem-report - 2.17.3-0ubuntu1
python3-apport - 2.17.3-0ubuntu1
python3-problem-report - 2.17.3-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: apport package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.17.3-0ubuntu1').
